fields.Title: INITIATION / ALCOHOL HABIT
fields.Description: A thought for becoming an alcoholic.

fields.Title: You: "Take a sip."
fields.Dialogue Text: Take a sip.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, yes. The chest pain and the diz..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, yes. The chest pain and the dizziness. You've *suffered* long enough -- now it's time to drink, to live.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying pop as the cap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a satisfying pop as the cap comes off, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Oh, no, you don't -- not this one...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, no, you don't -- not this one. That's not *you*. You...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "From the void we came. And to the v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From the void we came. And to the void we must return!

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Light reflects off the green glass..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Light reflects off the green glass of the Commodore Red. The gods have been generous. Better pop it open before they change their minds...

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "You've passed up your chance to sta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've passed up your chance to start drinking ALCOHOL for now, but don't worry! The option to start drinking becomes available again in 2 hours.

fields.Title: You: "No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore thought.]

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying crack as the c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a satisfying crack as the cap comes off, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

fields.Title: You: "Open the bottle."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open the bottle.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying pop as the cor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a satisfying pop as the cork jumps out, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "What a *solid* can of mass-produced..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What a *solid* can of mass-produced piss water. Well over 10% alcohol in this so-called *beer*. Pop it open before it gets too warm...

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Fine. We're not worried... you'll c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fine. We're not worried... you'll crawl back to this bottle soon enough. We'll give you another chance. Booze *always* gives you *another* chance.

fields.Title: You: "No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. No. I'm not doing it. [Ignore thought.]

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "In the bottom right corner of the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the bottom right corner of the screen there's an ALCOHOL button! ALCOHOL gives +1 to PHYSIQUE skills: Physical Instrument, Half Light, Electrochemistry, Endurance, Pain Threshold, and Shivers. This is good before rolling a White Check -- but damages your Morale. And remember...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Well, hello. Someone seems to have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well, hello. Someone seems to have found himself a bottle of *alcohol*. Here's where the *magic* happens.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Light reflects off the thermal cup...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Light reflects off the thermal cup. The borscht may not look like much, but doubtless it'll get the job done. Better pop it open before it gets cold...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Pale-aged vodka? This is rare game..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pale-aged vodka? This is rare game indeed. The gods have been generous. Better pop it open before they change their minds...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Fine. We're not worried... you'll c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fine. We're not worried... you'll crawl back to this bottle soon enough. We'll give you another chance. Booze *always* gives you *another* chance.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "There's a satisfying pop as the cap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a satisfying pop as the cap comes off, and the hair on your back rises like an army at attention. You've been here before. Welcome back, detective. You're home now...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Nothing. Some *mental* stuff. Nothi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing. Some *mental* stuff. Nothing to be worried about. Physically you'll be strong as an ox!

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "A golden sun melts down your throat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A golden sun melts down your throat, its rays filling your nostrils with sunshine. Your stomach melts from it -- into a happy gooey mess! So does your mind, all the bad things are melting. You're you again. A *real* cop. A real detective. *Incredibly* well done.

fields.Title: Volition: "Not *all* of us..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not *all* of us...

fields.Title: You: "What will be the repercussions if I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What will be the repercussions if I take that sip?

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "A golden sun melts down your throat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A golden sun melts down your throat, its rays filling your nostrils with sunshine. Your stomach melts from it -- into a happy gooey mess! So does your mind, all the bad things are melting. You're you again. A *real* cop. A real detective. *Incredibly* well done.

fields.Title: You: "Look at the bottle."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the bottle.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "You see a flash of teeth -- a young..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see a flash of teeth -- a young woman smiling at you, near some railway overpass in your ruined past. She is gorgeous. And she is *yours*.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Wow, the gods of mass production ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow, the gods of mass production have made this alcohol container *laughably* easy to open. A child could have done it.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "The light reflects off this bottle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The light reflects off this bottle of sweet, sweet liquor -- a gift from above. The gods have been generous. Pop it open before they change their minds...

fields.Title: Volition: "I don't know about this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't know about this...

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Why is it always about *you*? *Your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why is it always about *you*? *Your* heart problem? *Your* coronary artery? Think about *us*. We're in this together. You and your wacky tie of substance abuse! Do it for *us*! Pop it open.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Yes, it's *merciful* that way. It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, it's *merciful* that way. It's your friend. Come back to it, we're all rooting for you to.

fields.Title: You: "Should I though? I may have a teeny..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Should I though? I may have a teeny-weeny heart attack problem.
